bug.author: lvybriage
bug.summary: Succeeded trial doesn't have final result but webui show ×××(FINAL)
bug.description:
: I run an experiment, from webui overview table, I see that image. The trial didn't have final result. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60077202-077e1680-975c-11e9-92b8-2e90e1be0f3e.png></denchmark-link>
from detail page, trial had final result! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60077219-12d14200-975c-11e9-8160-8ecc4f8aaa1e.png></denchmark-link>
from rest api, I found that the trial did not have final result, like this pictrue <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60077274-309ea700-975c-11e9-8f73-dc60078eb2b6.png></denchmark-link>
So, it's confused. I found that detail table's final result was the latest intermediate result other than final result. But it rendered 0.160111(FINAL) <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60077343-5166fc80-975c-11e9-90c3-a0a32895428a.png></denchmark-link>
Brief what process you are following: How to reproduce it: nni Environment:
nni version: 0.8 nni mode(local|pai|remote): pai OS: -- python version: -- is conda or virtualenv used?: -- is running in docker?: --
need to update document(yes/no): no Anything else we need to know: webui show wrong message
